argumentText:
ARGUMENT
c

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | yonval.y | |- Y = ( Yon ` C ) |
| 2 |  | yonval.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 3 |  | yonval.o | |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 4 |  | yonval.m | |- M = ( HomF ` O ) |
| 5 |  | #P_df-yon | |- Yon = ( c e. Cat |-> ( <. c , ( oppCat ` c ) >. curryF ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` c ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> Yon = ( c e. Cat |-> ( <. c , ( oppCat ` c ) >. curryF ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` c ) ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ c = C ) -> c = C ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ c = C ) -> ( oppCat ` c ) = ( oppCat ` C ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( ph /\ c = C ) -> ( oppCat ` c ) = O ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_opeq12d | |- ( ( ph /\ c = C ) -> <. c , ( oppCat ` c ) >. = <. C , O >. ) |
| 11 | 9 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ c = C ) -> ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` c ) ) = ( HomF ` O ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 4 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( ph /\ c = C ) -> ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` c ) ) = M ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( ph /\ c = C ) -> ( <. c , ( oppCat ` c ) >. curryF ( HomF ` ( oppCat ` c ) ) ) = ( <. C , O >. curryF M ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( <. C , O >. curryF M ) e. _V |
| 15 | 14 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( <. C , O >. curryF M ) e. _V ) |
| 16 | 6, 13, 2, 15 | #P_fvmptd | |- ( ph -> ( Yon ` C ) = ( <. C , O >. curryF M ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 16 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> Y = ( <. C , O >. curryF M ) ) |
